description.spa: aquello que se percibe o se sabe o se infiere que tiene su existencia propia distinta (viva o no viva)
description.eng: An entity is any object so important to be denoted with a name. For example, a person, a place or a document (indicated by its title)
description.ita: Un'entità è un oggetto così importante da essere definto attraverso un nome. Ad esempio una persona, un luogo o un documento
description.cat: Realitat considerada per abstracció com a unitat (amb o sense vida)

description.eng: a theory of the world which encodes an individual’s subjective perspective about

description.spa: algo que sucede en un determinado lugar y tiempo
description.eng: something that happens at a given place and time
description.ita: qualcosa che accade in un dato luogo e tempo
description.cat: Fet que succeeix en un determinat moment

description.eng: Ordering of medication for patient or group
A Diagnostic report - a combination of request information, atomic results, images, interpretation, as well as formatted reports
The Medication resource allows for medications to be characterized by the form of the drug and the ingredient (or ingredients), as well as how it is packaged.
An interaction during which services are provided to the patient
that which is perceived or known or inferred to have its own distinct existence (living or nonliving).
a living entity that that has (or can develop) the ability to act or function independently
a human being
description.ita: entità umana considerata in quanto tale, senza caratterizzazioni di sesso, età, provenienza, ecc.

description.eng: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.
someone who practices a learned profession – a practitioner
how objects change in time
what formalizes the behavior that something is expected to have
a point or extent in space
description.ita: un punto o una misura nello spazio

description.spa: un artefacto que ha sido traído a la existencia por alguien
description.eng: Any product of the human intellect
description.cat: Allò que ha estat creat per algú

description.eng: A set of healthcare-related information that is assembled together into a single logical package that provides a single coherent statement of meaning, establishes its own context and that has clinical attestation with regard to who is making the statement.
(computer science) a file maintained in computer-readable form
description.ita: documento registrato nella memoria di un computer

description.spa: Un grupo de personas que forman una asociación institucionalmente independiente
description.eng: a group of people who work together
description.ita: complesso di persone organizzate per uno scopo
description.cat: Grup de persones que formen una associació institucionalment independent

description.eng: A grouping of people or organizations with a common purpose
Measurements and simple assertions made about a patient, device or other subject.

A record of a medication that is being consumed by a patient.   A MedicationStatement may indicate that the patient may be taking the medication now or has taken the medication in the past or will be taking the medication in the future.
Risk of harmful or undesirable, physiological response which is unique to an individual and associated with exposure to a substance.
A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

description.zho: 人或事物被认知的语言单位；“他的名字真的是乔治华盛顿”；“他们是同一个物体的两种名字”
description.ita: Il nome per il quale un'entità è conosciuta
description.cat: Unitat del llenguatge que designa una persona o cosa
description.ben: একটি ভাষাতাত্ত্বিক একক, যার সাহায্যে কোনো মানুষ বা বস্তুকে পরিচিত করা যায়
description.mon: хүн эсвэл зүйлийг нэрлэдэг хэлний нэгж
description.eng: The name by which an entity is known
a thing constructed
description.ita: una cosa costruita, un ente complesso costruito in molte parti

example.spa: una entidad compleja constituida por muchas partes
example.eng: a complex entity constructed of many parts

description.eng: data about data

description.spa: el período de tiempo durante el cual algo continúa
description.eng: Codifies a duration in time
description.cat: Període de temps durant el qual continua una cosa

name.zho: 时间中的一个特定的点

description.eng: A particular point in time
A name by which a person is known
